record.name: Logging

manualTransition.mtCondition: $L.tableAccess.update="true" and not (same($L.mode, "add")) and not (same(approval.status in $L.file, "pending")) and $G.ess="false"
manualTransition.mtCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.tableAccess.update">$L.tableAccess.update</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.mode">$L.mode</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">add</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Approval Status">approval.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">pending</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">false</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
manualTransition.mtCondDesc: ( $L.tableAccess.update = "true" AND $L.mode != "add" AND Approval Status in CurrentRecord != "pending" AND $G.ess = "false")

manualTransition.mtCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"$L.tableAccess.delete="true" and jscall("sdUtil.isStreamlinedSDEnabled")=true"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>

action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"$L.tableAccess.update=true and nullsub(jscall("security.getRights","Request Tasks","expert"),"false")=true and $L.mode~="add""</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>

record.updateCond: $L.tableAccess.new="true" and $L.mode="add" and not (same(approval.status in $L.file, "pending")) or $L.tableAccess.update="true" and $L.mode="browse" and not (same(approval.status in $L.file, "pending")) or $L.tableAccess.update="true" and $L.mode="update" and not (same(approval.status in $L.file, "pending"))
record.updateCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.tableAccess.new">$L.tableAccess.new</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.mode">$L.mode</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">add</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Approval Status">approval.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">pending</Value></condition></collection><collection logical="OR" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.tableAccess.update">$L.tableAccess.update</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.mode">$L.mode</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">browse</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Approval Status">approval.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">pending</Value></condition></collection><collection logical="OR" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.tableAccess.update">$L.tableAccess.update</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.mode">$L.mode</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">update</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Approval Status">approval.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">pending</Value></condition></collection></collection></XmlCondition>
record.updateCondDesc: (( $L.tableAccess.new = "true" AND $L.mode = "add" AND Approval Status in CurrentRecord != "pending") OR ( $L.tableAccess.update = "true" AND $L.mode = "browse" AND Approval Status in CurrentRecord != "pending") OR ( $L.tableAccess.update = "true" AND $L.mode = "update" AND Approval Status in CurrentRecord != "pending"))
